about_the_game:
"Zuma girl" is not suitable for children.

Specifically, CG that is appreciated in special appreciation becomes adult content. All characters in the game are 18 years old or older.

Zuma Girls 18 DLC contains a series of sexual contents which allow players to enjoy sex scenes inside the game Zuma Girls. Comparing to previous games we developed, Zuma Girls 18 DLC comes with a lot of new features on the sexual contents, which surely satisfy our fans. In addition, if you are a fan of NTR, Zuma Girls 18 DLC is the right choice for you!

- Brand new format.
- Fabulous sex scenes and animations.
- NTR included.
- Smooth gameplay.
- Pretty girls.

Open use mode:

Game purchase download DLC content, after confirming all, please click start game to enter the special appreciation interface to select characters and start to enjoy.

content_descriptors.notes:
- 裸露或色情内容
- 不适合在工作中观看
- 不适合所有年龄段的内容
- 游戏中的角色都超过18岁
